Class Account

java.lang.Object
Account
public class Account extends Object
Represents a social media account.

    • blockAccount

      public void blockAccount(Account account) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Blocks the given account if the user is logged in and the account is not already blocked. Removes the blocked account from followers and fallowing list.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be blocked.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      Parameters:
